undecided.Micro-Information Placement: Dates and times on cube faces
undecided.Hierarchy and Focal Flow: Cubes guide the eye through dates and details

lva.Layer 1: Background is a solid black, providing contrast for the white cubes.
lva.Layer 2: Main imagery consists of 3D cubes with bold black and white graphics, including faces and text.
lva.Layer 3: Text details such as dates and venue information are placed on the sides of the cubes, creating a layered effect.
lva.Layer 4: QR code and additional text are integrated into the cube design, adding interactive elements.
